title: What is your opinion if I choose maths as a subject? - Quora

response.answer_text: “MATHS IS THE LANGUAGE OF UNIVERSE” For example:- if you go to Spain,you should know Spanish for better communication and understanding. If you go to China ,you should know Mandarin, England for English, Russia then Russian……. In the same way if you want to study UNIVERSE , Maths is the language. It is the basis for everything around us. Good luck!!
